about.name: Mihir Kudale
about.title: Software Developer
about.focus: Data Analytics, Data Science, and AI Engineering
about.description: Specializes in scalable analytics platforms, BI workflow automation, and intelligent applications that transform raw data into actionable business intelligence.
about.credentials: Former Amazon Data Analyst and 3× Microsoft Certified professional.
about.availability: Available for on-site, remote, and freelance roles globally.
about.roles: Data Analyst • Data Scientist • Data Engineer • AI Engineer

contact.phone: Not provided publicly. Please reach out via email or LinkedIn.

projects.title: Amazon Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze product sales, returns, and reviews, addressing the need for data-driven decisions by providing insights into trends, geographic performance, and product metrics to optimize Amazon's e-commerce strategies.

projects.title: Blinkit Dashboard
projects.description: The Blinkit dashboard provides a comprehensive view of operations, including real-time order tracking, inventory management, and performance analytics. It streamlines decision-making by offering actionable insights to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Madhav E-Commerce Sales Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze Madhav Ecommerce sales performance, addressing the need for data-driven insights into sales, profit, and quantity by state, category, customer, and payment mode to optimize business strategies.

projects.title: Zomato Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze city-wise Zomato performance, addressing the need for data-driven insights to optimize marketing, improve service quality, enhance operations, and boost customer satisfaction and revenue growth.

projects.title: Swiggy Dashboard
projects.description: Created a Power BI dashboard for Swiggy metro cities, analyzing order trends, customer preferences, and restaurant performance to optimize operations and enhance satisfaction.

projects.title: Stock Market Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI Stock Market Dashboard using Python to analyze stocks, ETFs, and cryptocurrencies, addressing the need for a unified tool with real-time data, personalized insights, automated updates, and advanced analytics for informed investment decisions.

projects.title: Credit Card Financial Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze credit card revenue, transactions, and customer demographics, addressing the need for data-driven strategies to optimize offerings, enhance targeting, and drive revenue growth.

projects.title: ATM Transaction Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Created a Power BI dashboard to analyze ATM transactions, offering insights into usage trends, customer behavior, and machine performance to optimize ATM placement, improve efficiency, and enhance customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Tata Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive dashboard showcasing Ratan Tata's legacy and Tata Group's achievements, addressing the need to celebrate leadership and excellence by highlighting key milestones, ventures, and financial insights to inspire and engage stakeholders.

projects.title: Myntra Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard for Myntra, addressing the need for data-driven insights into category performance, regional sales, and customer behavior to optimize marketing and sales strategies.

projects.title: Google Trends Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze keyword trends, addressing the need for data-driven SEO by tracking keyword popularity, performance, and trends to optimize content and improve search rankings.

projects.title: Nike Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze Nike's sales performance, addressing the need for data-driven insights into regional sales, product trends, and monthly performance to optimize strategies and drive revenue.

projects.title: IPL Dashboard
projects.description: Created a Power BI dashboard for IPL performance analysis with live stats, offering real-time insights into team standings, player achievements, and match trends to drive decisions and boost fan engagement.

projects.title: Olympics Dashboard
projects.description: Created a Power BI dashboard for the 2024 Olympics with live stats, offering real-time insights into medal tallies, athlete performance, and event highlights to enhance analysis and fan engagement.

projects.title: Healthcare Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze patient wait times and case types, addressing the need for efficient healthcare management by providing insights into wait trends, age profiles, and specialties to improve operations and patient care.

projects.title: Superstore Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Power BI dashboard to analyze sales and profitability, addressing the need for data-driven business optimization. This solution tracks orders, sales, and profit by region, segment, and category, providing actionable insights to refine strategies and drive growth.

projects.title: Business Performance Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze year-wise sales performance, addressing the need for data-driven insights into trends, regional performance, product categories, and profitability to optimize growth strategies.

projects.title: Employee Performance Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to track employee performance, addressing the need for data-driven insights into targets, metrics, and activity to optimize productivity and improve team performance.

projects.title: Elections Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze election results and voter demographics, addressing the need for insights into political trends. This solution provides detailed analysis of seat counts, vote shares, margin trends, enabling a deeper understanding of voter behavior and political dynamics.

projects.title: HR Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze e-commerce sales, addressing the need for data-driven insights into sales, profit, and quantity by state, category, customer, and payment mode to optimize strategies and drive growth.

projects.title: Esses Ltd. Product Launch Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard for Essies Ltd's new product launch, addressing the need for data-driven insights into customer segmentation, regional performance, and product categories to optimize marketing strategies and ensure success.

projects.title: Optiverience PDL Merger Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a Power BI dashboard to analyze sales, profitability, and performance metrics during the Optiveriance and PDCL Ltd. merger, addressing the need for data-driven insights to support strategic decisions and optimize merger outcomes.

projects.title: Atliq Presence Insights Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard to track employee attendance, addressing the need for effective workforce management by monitoring attendance rates, work-from-home percentages, and sick leave trends to improve planning and productivity.

projects.title: Personal Finance Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard to manage personal finances, addressing the need for financial planning by tracking income, expenses, and savings with detailed insights and trend analysis.

projects.title: Student Spend Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard to analyze student spending patterns, addressing the need to understand consumer behavior by tracking purchases and spending trends across locations and age groups.

projects.title: City Bike Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Analyzed city bike-sharing data with Tableau, uncovering trends in station popularity, peak usage times, and user demographics to deliver actionable insights for optimizing bike availability and operational efficiency.

projects.title: Spotify Daily Global Trends Dashboard
projects.description: This project presents an interactive dashboard created using Tableau to analyze and visualize data from Spotify playlists. The dashboard provides insights into various playlists, tracks, and their characteristics, allowing users to explore trends and patterns in music consumption.

projects.title: Customer & Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Created interactive Tableau dashboards to analyze 2023 sales and customer metrics, highlighting trends, profits, and key insights, enabling data-driven decision-making for business growth.

projects.title: HR Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive HR Analytics Dashboard using Tableau to visualize key metrics like employee attrition, job satisfaction, and age-wise trends, enabling data-driven decision-making. The dashboard highlights insights on department-wise attrition, education field impact, and gender distribution

projects.title: Electric Vehicle Data Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: This Tableau dashboard provides a detailed analysis of electric vehicle (EV) data, highlighting total vehicles, average range, BEV and PHEV distribution, top manufacturers, model years, and state-wise adoption. It delivers actionable insights into EV trends and market growth.

projects.title: Bank Customer Churn Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Analyze and visualize bank customer churn data with this Tableau dashboard. Gain insights into churn rates by product usage, satisfaction scores, and demographic factors.

projects.title: Washington House Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Visualize and analyze house sales in King County, Washington with this Tableau dashboard. Gain insights into daily average prices, distribution of house prices, and property characteristics.

projects.title: London Bike Ride Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Analyze and visualize London bike ride data with this Tableau dashboard. Gain insights into ride counts, moving averages, and the relationship between temperature and wind speed.

projects.title: Amazon Prime Dashboard
projects.description: This Tableau dashboard visualizes Amazon Prime Movies and TV Shows data, showcasing key metrics such as the distribution of shows by country, popular genres, content ratings, and release trends over time. It provides a clear overview of content type and genre popularity.

projects.title: Amazon Sales in India Dashboard
projects.description: The goal of this project was to develop a Tableau dashboard to analyze sales performance on Amazon. The focus was on understanding product sales, returns, customer reviews, and geographic performance to support effective e-commerce strategies.

projects.title: New York City Airbnb Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Analyze and visualize Airbnb data for New York City with this Tableau dashboard. Gain insights into bookings, reviews, room types, and neighborhood trends.

projects.title: Netflix Dashboard
projects.description: Analyze and visualize Netflix data with this Tableau dashboard. Gain insights into movies and TV shows by country, genre, ratings, and release year.

projects.title: British Airways Reviews Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Analyze and visualize customer reviews for British Airways with this Tableau dashboard. Gain insights into average ratings, service metrics, and review trends by month, country, and aircraft type.

projects.title: Atliq Hardware Sales Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Dive into comprehensive sales analytics with an interactive Power BI dashboard, leveraging MySQL data to unveil key market trends and performance metrics for Atliq Hardware.

projects.title: Covid-19 Timeline Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Visualize and analyze the spread of Covid-19 with this Tableau dashboard. Gain insights into confirmed cases, deaths, and trends over time by location.

projects.title: KPMG Sproket Central Project Dashboard
projects.description: Analyze customer segmentation and product performance with this Tableau dashboard. Gain insights into clustering, product lines, and brand preferences.

projects.title: Walmart Sales Data Analysis
projects.description: Explore and analyze Walmart sales data using SQL to identify top-performing branches and products, sales trends, and customer behavior.

projects.title: Shark Tank India Analysis
projects.description: Analyze and explore Shark Tank India data using SQL to understand investment trends, pitch success rates, gender ratios, and more.

projects.title: Stock Market Dashboard
projects.description: This project aims to develop an interactive and insightful stock market dashboard, leveraging historical market data for informed decision-making.

projects.title: Vrinda Store Sales Data Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: The dashboard is designed to provide a holistic view of Vrinda Store’s sales performance, customer demographics, and operational efficiency. It helps stakeholders Analyze sales patterns and trends. Understand customer preferences. Identify top-performing regions & channels etc.

projects.title: Image Scrapper
projects.description: Developed an image scraper tool to automate image collection, addressing the need for efficient data gathering for machine learning, brand monitoring, and visual trend analysis.

projects.title: Flipkart Reviews Scrapper
projects.description: Developed a Python-based Flipkart review scraper to efficiently extract product reviews and ratings. Stored the extracted data in a MongoDB database for comprehensive analysis and insights.

projects.title: Health Insurance Cross Sell Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for health insurance cross-sell prediction, addressing the need for targeted marketing by identifying potential customers, improving conversion rates, optimizing resource allocation, and enhancing customer satisfaction and retention.

projects.title: Campus Placement Prediction
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end Python ML project for campus placement prediction, leveraging academic records to provide actionable insights and improve placement success rates.

projects.title: APS Sensor Fault Detection
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution to predict sensor faults in air pressure systems of heavy-duty vehicles, reducing downtime, preventing breakdowns, and improving fleet efficiency.

projects.title: Credit Card Default Prediction
projects.description: Built a credit card payment default prediction system using machine learning, deployed as a scalable application on the cloud to support real-time financial risk management by identifying high-risk customers and minimizing credit losses.

projects.title: Wafer Sensor Fault Detection
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for wafer sensor fault detection, enabling early identification of defects, minimizing production disruptions, reducing operational costs, and improving product quality and manufacturing efficiency.

projects.title: Cement Strength Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for cement strength prediction, addressing the need for reliable construction materials by optimizing raw material usage, reducing waste, improving efficiency, and ensuring consistent product quality.

projects.title: Forest Cover Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for forest cover prediction, addressing the need for sustainable land management by accurately classifying forest types, supporting conservation, optimizing resources, and enhancing environmental monitoring.

projects.title: Income Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for income prediction, addressing the need for targeted financial planning and policy-making by accurately forecasting income levels, supporting economic analysis, optimizing resource allocation, and enabling personalized recommendations.

projects.title: Insurance Fraud Detection
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for insurance fraud detection, addressing the need to combat fraud by identifying anomalies, reducing losses, enhancing efficiency, and ensuring fair practices in the insurance industry.

projects.title: Mushroom Classification
projects.description: Developed machine learning solution for mushroom classification to address the critical need for safe foraging and consumption. This solution accurately distinguishes between edible and toxic species, reducing health risks, enhancing food safety, and supporting ecological research and conservation.

projects.title: Phishing Classifier
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for phishing detection, addressing the need for enhanced cybersecurity by accurately identifying phishing attempts, preventing data breaches, protecting sensitive information, and reducing financial and reputational risks for individuals and organizations.

projects.title: Thyroid Detection
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for thyroid disorder detection, addressing the need for early diagnosis by enabling accurate predictions, timely treatment, improved patient outcomes, and reduced healthcare costs.

projects.title: NYC Taxi Analysis
projects.description: Developed an MLOps project on NYC taxi analysis to analyze and predict taxi demand, fare pricing, and trip patterns. This project helps optimize fleet management and improve urban transportation planning.

projects.title: Climate Visibility Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning solution for climate visibility prediction, addressing the need for accurate weather forecasting by providing precise visibility estimates, enhancing transportation safety, supporting disaster management, and improving planning for climate-sensitive activities.

projects.title: Credit Risk Modeling
projects.description: Developed a machine learning project on credit risk modeling, which predicts the likelihood of loan defaults by analyzing customer data. This project is essential for banks and financial institutions to minimize risks and make informed lending decisions.

projects.title: Emotion Detection
projects.description: Developed an emotion detection system using deep learning to classify emotions from facial expressions, enabling more personalized interactions in areas like customer service, mental health monitoring, and user experience.

projects.title: Automated Car Parking Detection
projects.description: Developed a computer vision-based machine learning solution for an automated car parking detection system, addressing the need for efficient parking management by accurately detecting available spaces, reducing search time, optimizing space utilization, and enhancing user convenience in urban areas.

projects.title: E-KYC
projects.description: Created a computer vision project on eKYC, automating identity verification by analyzing documents and facial recognition. This project addresses the need for secure, efficient, and scalable customer onboarding in financial and regulatory services.

projects.title: Zomato Chatbot
projects.description: Developed a Zomato-Chatbot using Generative AI to assist users in exploring restaurant options, viewing menus, and placing orders through an interactive conversational interface. This project enhances customer experience by providing quick and personalized assistance.

projects.title: Source Code Analyzer
projects.description: Developed a source code analysis project using Generative AI to identify vulnerabilities, optimize code structure, and provide intelligent recommendations. This project addresses the need for efficient and automated code review, improving software quality and security.

projects.title: Microsoft Teams Auto-Reply Chatbot
projects.description: Built an AI-powered auto-reply chatbot for Microsoft Teams using n8n and OpenAI GPT-4. Configured webhook triggers and message parsing workflows to capture user input in Teams, route messages to GPT-4 via API, and send real-time responses back to the same chat thread. Integrated Microsoft Graph API for seamless Teams communication and automated message handling. Improved response accuracy and reduced support load by enabling 24/7 AI-driven replies in enterprise collaboration channels.
